sentences.english: Goh Teck Sien is our first year missiological student in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 吳哲仙是衛理神學院2009年宣教科一年級學生。

sentences.english: Patient teaching for discharge begins when the patient returns from the OR.
sentences.chinese: 在病人從手術室返回時就應開始病人出院宣教。

sentences.english: He found Paul and brought him back to Antioch to minister together.
sentences.chinese: 他找到了保羅並把他帶回安提阿一起宣教。

sentences.english: For his 2 nd missionary journey, there was Silas, and later Timothy.
sentences.chinese: 第二次宣教旅行時，有西拉和提摩太同工。

sentences.english: Should strengthen the education of high-risk groups, drug rehabilitation as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 應加強對高危人羣的宣教工作，及早戒毒。

sentences.english: Simultaneously propagandizes the central relation media, carries on the healthy propaganda to the general residents.
sentences.chinese: 同時宣傳中心聯繫媒體，對廣大市民進行健康宣教。

sentences.english: It was a good fit for Paul's purpose in this 2 nd missionary journey.
sentences.chinese: 對保羅來說，西拉是第二次宣教旅行的合適人選。

sentences.english: Derek is a missionary from Hong Kong who had served in Peru for 4 years.
sentences.chinese: 梁健民宣教士來自香港，在祕魯宣教達四年之久。

sentences.english: Personal evangelismrather than public preaching is the method which produces results.
sentences.chinese: 針對個人傳道比公開宣教的效果會更好。

sentences.english: Most mission agencies have age-appropriate short term projects.
sentences.chinese: 很多宣教機構都有適合不同年齡參加者的短宣計劃。

sentences.english: College student ministry is a huge part of the missions effort in China.
sentences.chinese: 大學生事工在中國宣教事工中佔一個十分重要的部分。

sentences.english: They were part of his evangelistic team.
sentences.chinese: 他們是他宣教隊伍的成員。

sentences.english: Similar meetings havesince been held in many cities of Iran.
sentences.chinese: 類似的宣教會也在伊朗的其他城市成功舉辦。

sentences.english: A missionary who worked with Underground Evangelism told a story about a believer in Russia before the collapse of communism.
sentences.chinese: 有位曾參與地下宣教的傳教士，講過這樣一個故事。

sentences.english: We noticed that the individuals in Paul's teams were members of the gentile church.
sentences.chinese: 我們注意到保羅宣教團隊的成員都是來自外邦的教會。

sentences.english: Ideological attribute determines that culture has the propagandistic and educational function.
sentences.chinese: 意識形態屬性決定了文化具有宣教功能。

definition: to lecture on doctrine/to expound the wisdom of ancient sages/to preach/a sermon
Holy sacrament/Christian rite (esp. Catholic)/also called 聖禮|圣礼 by Protestants
Holy sacrament/Christian rite (esp. Protestant)/also called 聖事|圣事 by Catholics
